name: Moonies
description:
You can never get too many Moonies!

Moonies is a parody of Gremlins, one of my favorite movie (Actually Gremlins 2 is one of my favorite).

You start with two Moonies. Feed them, take care of them, let them reproduce, sell them. Don’t run out of money, or else…

The game ends if your balance becomes $-100

Author: Jack Le Hamster

Tool used:

  • Adobe Animate CC (yes Flash!)
  • Online sequencer
  • Bfxr
